attributes.action: prevent the proposed £25 per day congestion charge for residents of London living within the congestion charge zone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The mayors office recently sent out a consultation leaflet to make people aware of proposed changes to the congestion charge. They propose to charge £25 a day irrespective of whether you live within the zone based on the carbon emissions of the car. 

Many people who live within the zone complained about the congestion charge extension. The extension still went ahead. Due to the infamy of the chelsea tractor that west londoners supposedly have this is a lucrative way for the mayors office to make extra cash.

It is completely unacceptable as it will cost an additional £6500 a year to run a car that you already own and bought prior to this notice of consultation.  

I propose that the change to the scheme should be to allow for residents to still claim a discounted rate if they live within the congestion zone.

Another alternative is to have a cut off date for purchasing a car that produces certain emissions. This should be put in place to prevent penalising someone for a decision they made in the past.

People in London already have enough charges and costs associated with living in the capital that an additional levy on congestion charge is unfair.

Please sign up to prevent this from going ahead.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
